EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: GoDirect Users Conference in Morristown, May 11, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for GoDirect Users Conference in Morristown. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Users Conference Date: May 11, 2017 Location: The Westin Governor Morris 2 Whippany Road, Morristown, NJ 07960
We will be in touch with more details. We look forward to meeting you at the conference.
Sincerely,
Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
